name: dcd-api-mqtt
description: An NodeJS MQTT API for the Data-Centric Design Hub

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG MODEL_HOST=localhost API_URL=http://localhost:4478/api KETO_URL=http://localhost:4466 HYDRA_ADMIN_URL=http://localhost:4445 OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL=http://localhost:4444/oauth2/token MQTT_HOST=localhost OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID=dcd-api-mqtt OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET=mqtt-secret MQTT_USER=test MQTT_PASS=test MQTT_PORT=1883 CRYPTO_KEY=cryptoKeyToChange KAFKA=true KAFKA_HOST=10.0.1.16 KAFKA_PORT=9092 MQTT_PORT=1883 MQTT_HOST=localhost node index.js
scripts.mock: NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG MODEL_HOST=localhost API_URL=http://localhost:4478/api KETO_URL=http://localhost:4466 HYDRA_ADMIN_URL=http://localhost:4445 OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL=http://localhost:4444/oauth2/token MQTT_HOST=localhost OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID=dcd-api-mqtt OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET=mqtt-secret MQTT_PORT=1883 CRYPTO_KEY=cryptoKeyToChange KAFKA=true KAFKA_HOST=10.0.1.16 KAFKA_PORT=9092 node ./test/client.test.js

author: Jacky Bourgeois
